update.downloaded: Banana ready! Install when you go bye-bye!

onboarding.title: Bello! Welcome!
onboarding.s1_desc: Download Doki Doki Literature Club from banana website (ddlc.moe) â€“ click below, bello!
onboarding.s2_desc: After download, pick file below, banana!

login_input.details: Banana link sent! Click to log in, bello!

uninstall_confirmation.message: You sure want to uninstall, banana?
uninstall_confirmation.details: Your save data for {0} will be deleted, and you need a copy of the mod to install again, banana!

rename_input.details: Type the new name for {0}, banana!

mod_delete_confirmation.message: You sure want to delete the mod, banana?
mod_delete_confirmation.details: You need to download another copy of the mod to install again, banana!

save_delete_confirmation.message: You sure want to delete your save data, banana?
save_delete_confirmation.details: You have to start {0} again from scratch, banana!

install.description_achievements: Keep playing to unlock more achievements, banana!
install.description_screenshots: Press S while playing to take a screenshot, banana!
install.description_sdk: This mod supports special features with the Doki Doki Mod Manager SDK, banana!

install_creation.title: Install DDLC, banana!
install_creation.description_mod: Click to browse for a mod, banana!
install_creation.description_vanilla: A clean copy of DDLC will be created. The save data will be separate from any other copy of the game, banana!
install_creation.description_vanilla_global_save: A clean copy of DDLC will be created. The save data will be shared with other copies of the game (like Steam), banana!
install_creation.description_modded: A copy of DDLC will be created, and the mod will be installed. The save data will be separate from any other copy of the game, banana!
install_creation.description_modded_global_save: A copy of DDLC will be created, and the mod will be installed. The save data will be shared with other copies of the game (like Steam), banana!
install_creation.status_exists: That folder already exists. Pick another folder name, banana!

tab_store_placeholder.title: Store coming soon, banana!
tab_store_placeholder.description_1: The Sayonika mod database will be a central place to share, download and review DDLC mods, banana! When Sayonika is public, you can browse mods here in Doki Doki Mod Manager, banana!
tab_store_placeholder.description_2: While you wait, download some recommended mods, banana!
tab_store_placeholder.error: Failed to load the list of mods. Are you offline, banana?

tab_store.title: Sayonika Store, banana!
tab_store.subtitle: Discover and download DDLC mods, banana!
tab_store.offline_message: You are offline. Check your internet and try again, banana!
tab_store.maintenance_banner: Authentication services are down for maintenance, banana! You can browse mods but can't log in or register, banana!
tab_store.no_mods_message: Try changing your search or filters, banana!

login.title: Login to Sayonika, banana!
login.username_help: You can use your username or email to log in, banana!

translation.enabled: Translation enabled, banana! Content will be translated when available, banana!

section_backgrounds.title: Background, banana!
section_backgrounds.subtitle: Customize your Doki Doki Mod Manager with backgrounds, banana!
section_backgrounds.description_credit: Original DDLC backgrounds by Team Salvato, banana!

section_storage.title: Storage Location, banana!
section_storage.subtitle: Change where your game data is stored, banana!
section_storage.description_moving: Warning! If you change your install location, all your mods, installs and save data will be moved, banana! This may take a while, and can't be stopped, banana!

section_updates.title: Updates, banana!
section_updates.subtitle: Get the latest version of Doki Doki Mod Manager, banana!

section_sdk.title: Achievements & SDK, banana!
section_sdk.subtitle: Change how achievements work, banana!
section_sdk.checkbox_specified: When the mod supports them, banana!

section_testing.title: SDK Debug, banana!
section_testing.subtitle: Enable debug logging to test your mods, banana!

section_language.title: Language, banana!
section_language.subtitle: Change the language of Doki Doki Mod Manager, banana!
section_language.notification_changed: Language changed to {0}, banana! Restart to see changes, banana!
section_language.notification_same: Language is already set to {0}, banana!

tab_about.title: About, banana!
tab_about.description: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a community project to help you find, install and play mods for Doki Doki Literature Club, a free Visual Novel game by Team Salvato, banana!
tab_about.disclaimer_1: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a fan work and not by Team Salvato, banana! It's a fan work, like Team Salvato's IP rules, banana!
tab_about.disclaimer_2: Doki Doki Mod Manager not responsible for any damage to your files or computer, banana! Make sure mods are safe, banana!
tab_about.description_support: Doki Doki Mod Manager is always free, banana! If you like it, support me, banana!

jumplist.task_launch: Open Doki Doki Mod Manager and launch {0}, banana!

running_cover.description_running: Close the game to change your mods, banana!
running_cover.install_missing: The install could not be found, banana!
running_cover.install_corrupt: The install is incomplete or broken, banana!
